hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:A man asked the Prophet (ﷺ) "When will the Hour be established O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)?" The Prophet (ﷺ) . said, "What have you prepared for it?" The man said, " I haven't prepared for it much of prayers or fast or alms, but I love Allah and His Apostle." The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "You will be with those whom you love

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ عَلاَمَةِ حُبِّ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ
